website_summaries.verdict: This warm but not overly hot flavor meshes well with sandwiches, barbecue, and pizza.
pros: Very familiar and traditional BBQ potato chip flavor, with a nice sweet heat profile and a satisfying crunch
cons: Some complaints about saltiness, and those who crave extreme heat may want to bump up to Buffalo Wings flavor

customer_reviews.title: I’m pretty sure I couldn’t exist without these.
customer_reviews.text: I have cases of these chips (the salt & vinegar and sometimes the ridges BBQ) on subscribe and save so that I never run out that’s how freaking amazing they are! The chips themselves are never greasy, so light and airy they are just awesome. The salt & vinegar flavor is just that perfect amount of salt & tangy. I’m pretty sure I couldn’t exist without these.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne M

customer_reviews.title: Popchips... part duex
customer_reviews.text: I've given Popchips 5 star ratings before but this shipment...nope. Either these are a mistake or they've changed the formula or processing or something but I do not like them. Popchips used to be like tiny thin rice cakes but crispier. These bags were flatter, harder, more crunchy than crispy. I used to love the texture (mouthfeel) of these but that satisfaction was no where to be found. Boo hiss.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Vaughn Black

customer_reviews.title: Not crazy hot
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter who loves to eat the Flaming Hot varieties of snacks. These were not up to par. More like a spicy barbeque. They were good but not as hot or spicy as she would have liked. Actually gave them away.
customer_reviews.author: jonesp

customer_reviews.title: Tasty And Low Fat!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have been eating these chips for quite some time now they have a very tasty they have a nice strong barbecue flavor My Wife 💏👰🏻 actu we have been eating these chips for quite some time now they have a very tasty they have a nice strong barbecue flavor My Wife 💏👰🏻 actually likes to lick the shift and then eat them afterwards just because it taste so good I highly recommend them to the fact of the lower in fat and still have plenty of taste if I have one negative thing to say is that it's hard to open the bags that's about my only complaint about these chips
customer_reviews.author: StephenShu

customer_reviews.title: Super crunchy, way less oil than regular chips.
customer_reviews.text: Larger packages than I was expecting. These are my favorite flavor of Popchips. I don't usually go for BBQ flavored chips, but these are the exception. They are way less oily and have a lot of crunch.
customer_reviews.author: Demaris

customer_reviews.title: Schizo Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: The popchip itself is fabulous! For some reason, the sour cream onion flavor seems to be "inconsistent", for lack of a better word. I receive a 12pk each month and in the beginning, all was fine. About 4 months ago, I received a shipment that tasted like "ranch" rather than onion. I wrote down the lot number and called customer service who assured me it was assigned to "onion". The next month, the shipment tasted like onion again. The following month, "ranch" taste again with a new lot number...this month I didn't order the item - the cheddar tastes better anyway!
customer_reviews.author: linda galella

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: Love pop chips and was looking forward to receiving what I ordered - salt & vinegar flavor. Unfortunately, I received cheddar and sour cream. Rather than dealing with the hassle of a return I decided to try them. Mistake. Maybe next time I'll receive what I ordered and paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: I tried these in London and loved them . I ordered them here on the states and they are terrible!! I am not sure what to do with the other 11 bags in the case I ordered. Would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl ruhe

customer_reviews.title: Too dry.
customer_reviews.text: I’m still looking for a chip without the grease but isn’t as dry as a bone. So far, everything I’ve tried has the consistency of sawdust. While it is spicy, just the way I like it, it’s still too dry. I won’t buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: DeborahTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Short Shelf Life.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, the shelf life on these are very short. I got one box in Feb 2018, and it would expire in April 2018. I would stay away from ordering these from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to hot fried chips
customer_reviews.text: I am truly addicted to hot chips (hot cheetos, hot lays, etc) and have been searching for a “healthier” alternative for YEARS. I have found them! This is the only thing that curves my craving and doesn’t leave me feeling terrible the way hot cheetos do. So grateful to have found these!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Best chips ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious. Probably the best chips ever. These chips are packed with flavor and they have a decent kick to them. They are hard to put down after you have started eating them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Chen

customer_reviews.title: Bomb AF!!!
customer_reviews.text: Never had these but I'm glad I bought them!! Lol was super surprised when I got them didn't expect them to be that big! Taste so good too wasn't expecting them to be this hot I'm starting to sweat ha, lit.
customer_reviews.author: Andyloc

customer_reviews.title: Never Received
customer_reviews.text: I would have more than likely given this product all five stars because I absolutely love these chips, but we never received our package due to damage in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Hot is crazy good!
customer_reviews.text: These chips are just about the best chips I have tried in a while. My go to is Crazy Hot which is just shy of Hot Cheetos hot if not the same. Legit good!
customer_reviews.author: Ramo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Loveee it. The box it came in aside from the amazon box, says best by December 2019. All 5 bags did as well. Delivery came a little bruised up and a day late but overall, love it.
customer_reviews.author: MariGnav

customer_reviews.title: Family loves this flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Our family is from Texas and we love any type of spicy food! When my husband found these pop chips on amazon he had to order them. Well we all love them! We even have had some of our friends try them and they agree.
customer_reviews.author: AOwens

customer_reviews.title: Not as good anymore, badly cooked, 3 days to expiration.
customer_reviews.text: What happened to this brand. Varieties got reduced to just a few before and now the chips seem to be rushed & badly made/broken. And too many perfectly flat/round unpopped potato discs in package. Also I received order on March 5th and best by date was March 8th.
customer_reviews.author: marauder

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips and I can no longer find them at my local grocery stores so I was delighted to find them in bulk here.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher& Michelle Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: In Love!
customer_reviews.text: I can not express how much I love popchips! I ordered 4 cases of these in different flavors. I have always been a chip lover, but had to sadly try and break-up with lays and doritos because they were starting to ruin my diet plans. But then one day my health conscious mother-in-law had me try these new brand POPCHIPS! They are all natural ingredients, not fried, and much less calories. I started purchasing them at my local grocery store, but became frustrated because they were always almost sold out. So lone and behold.....you can purchase anything on Amazon. So I ordered 4 cases of popchips ordered. My favorite flavor so far is barbeque. Can't go wrong with barbeque!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These are some delicious little chips. They have a nice crunch and a great flavor! They are a little more pricey but they are really good!
customer_reviews.author: Alex S

customer_reviews.title: Glad to get these on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Love these chips and can’t find them in local store. I was hesitant based on some reviews of burnt product but mine were delicious.
customer_reviews.author: KAthy

customer_reviews.title: Not like they used to be
customer_reviews.text: They dont taste right. Expiration date is July, not sure if that’s why. Most of them are a bit tasteless, less salty and a bit well done.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: If you don't like spicy things
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious! I was looking for a healthier alternative to hot Cheetos that still gave you the crunch as well as the heat. These hit the spot! About half-way through the bag, the burn kicks in. If you don't like spicy things, don't order these! But they are delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Sara H

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! No milk. No immediate corn (except maltodextrin)
customer_reviews.text: I have bad allergies/intolerances. These do not have milk, and dont upset my corn intolerance. (No direct corn or starch just maltodextrin)
customer_reviews.author: Tcabez

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: I remembered the first time I ate Popchips, I love them. This flavor is super delicious , crispier than ever , round for dipping. I will recommend an avocado dip, green onions dip, black beans dip or green tomatillo with Cilantro dip. Best bake or any chip ever made
customer_reviews.author: classic lady

customer_reviews.title: My guilty pleasure
customer_reviews.text: I'm so very very addicted to BBQ Pop chips. I only really crave them after a really hard workout when I sweat a lot so it could be that I need a hit of sodium but for whatever reason, these darn things hit the spot every time (and it HAS to be BBQ). I felt a little guilty when the giant box of 12 showed up on my door, but I do share...(if I have to LOL) with my family and the pricing worked out that they were much less then they would be in stores.
customer_reviews.author: LazyUnicorn

customer_reviews.title: I love these chips
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips! They used to be very easy to find in the grocery stores but lately I only see the regular sea salt, salt and pepper, BBQ, sweet potato and veggie chips available. I ordered multiple cases at a time in the past...strange how they jumped from ~28 a case to 46 :(
customer_reviews.author: Dr.M

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain! Love the flavor/calorie content of these BBQ ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bargain! Love the flavor/calorie content of these BBQ chips, but they're expensive and the bags are little. I've been looking for a more affordable option since Costco hasn't been carrying the jumbo sized bags anymore. This bundle does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Clark

customer_reviews.title: 5* plus, great taste and cruch!
customer_reviews.text: Best chips out there that are "diet" but don't taste like it - again, you just find something you like that matches the quality of a regular chip with less than half the fat - and then ... sometimes try to find it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crack chips - so good!
customer_reviews.text: These chips are freakin' delicious. If you like spicy chips, you will LOVE these. I mistakenly purchased a box of the sharing size bags (meant to get the individual snack bags), and we had no problem eating them all. They're super addictive!
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoBurbsGirl

customer_reviews.title: My guilty pleasure
customer_reviews.text: Why not get a huge box of these salt and vinegar pop chips to indulge in? My favorite! This 12 pack will last a few months but it’s perfect for a late night snack, and a real score since I can’t find this flavor in any store!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: to these for the holidays and the whole family loves these chips. The flavor is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I like the BBQ ones much more. If you prefer hot, this may be for you. I love spicy things but the BBQ has the je ne sais quoi for me.
customer_reviews.author: K433Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great chips!
customer_reviews.text: We have been buying Popchips for years - very good! Our fave is the BBQ but the others are good, too. When my picky kiddos eat them, you know they must be good!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmm
customer_reviews.text: Tasty and a more healthy version of a favorite snack!
customer_reviews.author: H. W.

customer_reviews.title: Addicted
customer_reviews.text: My favorite snack! So tasty and combining them with a turkey sandwich makes my day. I cant stop, i wont stop.
customer_reviews.author: Christos Segkos

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love these chips! They're my favorite. My guests love them. I don't eat spicy foods, but these chips are so tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Jostina

customer_reviews.title: Pop chips BBQ are a healthy alternative to oil/fried artery jammers.
customer_reviews.text: Taste great. Getting hard to find this size in the stores so I'll let Amazon bring them to my door.These are also probably the healthiest chips around. Light as a feather but without sacrificing flavor.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: This is mild Hot taste better if bag has been open for 24 hrs
customer_reviews.text: This is mild Hot taste better if bag has been open for 24 hrs. Product named wrong Bought looking for a burn. Not like Tabasco may be hotter. Just due to the name i pass on reordering.
customer_reviews.author: A Martin

customer_reviews.title: My favorite chips!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried some of the other flavors, but the crazy hot flavor is by far my favorite one!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Got the wrong chips :(
customer_reviews.text: Ended up getting cheddar & sour cream when I ordered BBQ. Would of preferred to get what I selected but I guess I can live with these, also I grossly underestimated the amount of product....I have chips for days!
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I have been unable to find these in any of our local stores and to be able to get a whole case is awesome. I love the flavor! Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: marsha lambert

customer_reviews.title: My review speaks for itself! :)
customer_reviews.text: Yum! Yum yum yum... yum! Yum?? YUMMM!! Nom nom nom nom.... DEE-LISH!
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Consider this Pop chip lovers
customer_reviews.text: The crumb content was acceptable this time. These chips are amazing but it is hard to accept when they have a lot of crumbs inside (because they are expensive and there's a crazy amount of air inside these indestructible bags) do they ration out the crumbs? Or maybe they rattle around inside all that air and create crumbs as they hit the solid walls of the inside of their thick bag. Hmm
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Will have to stop buying as they are addictive! Lets me be good and naughty at the same time. Great flavor, crunch, and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C

customer_reviews.title: Satisfies the craving
customer_reviews.text: Satisfies the craving for flamin' hot cheetos without having to eat flamin' hot cheetos. My savior!
customer_reviews.author: Holden Craig

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic chips!
customer_reviews.text: These chips seemed to have come out of nowhere. Now I won't buy any other chips! They are fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl L. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m addicted to these chips. They are so yummy and very addictive.

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: Taste very good. Can feel a bit bloated if you eat a lot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these!! I buy them for my Mom because she can't get them where she lives!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Swearengin

customer_reviews.title: Chips were crushed! Shipping terrible!
customer_reviews.text: over half of these bags of pop chips were crushed flat in the bottom of the box! Barely edible, very disappointing!

customer_reviews.title: but you can get as good a deal in your local supermarket
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty and low calorie, but you can get as good a deal in your local supermarket.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Taste so good. Very good quality and came on time.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item sent
customer_reviews.text: BBQ is great but not when we keep getting wrong item. 2nd time now

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes the hot stuff, but they were a bit much for me!

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: Love these chips esp for the health content they have vs other chips.
customer_reviews.author: D57H

customer_reviews.title: So much in love with this chips
customer_reviews.text: So much in love with this chips. They taste great with a good amount of spiciness. Thanks to seller for selling them here in Amazon in large quantities!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love prinkles and this popchips are very competitive to be on my no.1 favorite chips.

customer_reviews.title: Had to stop ordering these. I was eating a ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to stop ordering these. I was eating a bag a day. They were my three AM go to snack.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: I love pop chips especially the sour cream and onion I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love pop chips especially the sour cream and onion I like the fact that they are not fried, so you don't have the grease. I have craved salt all my life and the sea salt is healthier.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME FLAVOR AND GREAT SERVICE.
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME chips and great taste. Package arrived in perfect condition double boxed.
customer_reviews.author: Starr Mihalakis

customer_reviews.title: Low Fat and Low Calories
customer_reviews.text: Low fat & low cal! A big plus is that they actually taste good!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought em for my son. He loves them! I’m vegan, so I can’t eat them.

customer_reviews.title: Hot stuff:)
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pop chips by far! Seller offers them at a good price as well.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the chips but the price is a little higher than most markets.

customer_reviews.title: Taste horrible
customer_reviews.text: Taste horrible, the barbecue flavor smells nice, but taste like nothing

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. nice crunch, good flavor. not really like a potato chip though, more its own thing.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Taste
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I love the popchips. The taste is great and you feel healthy eating them, even though you're fooling yourself.

customer_reviews.title: So tasty and vinegar-y!
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor on these! I love dill pickles, and these are like those, without the dill! Yummy!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the barbeque flavor of these Popchips! I've tried other flavors but these are by far my favorite!

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flavor!
customer_reviews.text: These were actually fresher than the ones I buy locally!

customer_reviews.title: this is my favorite chip brand
customer_reviews.text: this is my favorite chip brand, spicy and tangy! it's not always available in stores near me, so I had to buy it online.

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: I have become obsessed with these chips! Went through the case of 12 in like two weeks! They say limited edition, but I really hope they make them permanent! The crazy hot are the best!

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHIPS EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these chips!! Buying in bulk saved me quite a bit as they go for about $3.99 - $4.99 a bag where I live.

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHIPS EVER
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these chips, can never stop eating them because they taste so good

customer_reviews.title: They give you that crunch when you are trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: They give you that crunch when you are trying to watch your calorie intake. You don't have to feel guilty about eating them either.

customer_reviews.title: So gooood!
customer_reviews.text: So delicious! I'm very health conscious and these are my go to, favorite chips!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Were good light snack. I personally would have liked a little more heat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than the rapture, not quite as good as sex.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Yummy. Low cal. Arrived fast and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Taste bad
customer_reviews.text: Popchips changed the wrapper and changed the flavor of these salt & vinegar chips. I have been buying these for years and I loved the taste the way the company had it in the dark green bag. The popchips in this new white and blue bag have a different taste. The chips are flat tasting. I have called the company several times and left a message about the way they are now making their popchips, but noone returns my calls. DO NOT BUY these if you like they way they were.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Minardi

customer_reviews.title: Those two bags were wasted.
customer_reviews.text: The seams on the back of two bags were split causing the chips to spill into the box during shipment. Those two bags were wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A. Hunziker

customer_reviews.title: VERY STRONG VINEGAR AFTERTASTE
customer_reviews.text: THESE CHIPS ARE LIGHT BUT THE VINEGAR TASTE IS SO VERY STRONG, IT IS HOT IN YOUR MOUTH FOR SEVERAL MINUTES AND GAVE ME A STOMACH ACHE AFTERWARDS.

customer_reviews.title: Chips were good, they tasted like barbeque chips
customer_reviews.text: Chips were good, they tasted like barbeque chips. I am grateful they tasted like that and not like sour cream and onion.

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: We love these chips. Baked and high protein content. Hard to find in our local store. Got a case quick on amazon

product_meta.title: Popchips Potato Chips BBQ Potato Chips 5 oz Bags (Pack of 12)
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Barbeque| Size:5 Ounce (Pack of 12)We believe in the freedom to snack. That’ s why we created a new chip. One that’ s deeply satisfying but never deep fried. So you can feel free to eat one, two, three handfuls, or even a whole bag. and why not? it’ s okay, they’ re popchips! Crunchy and flavorful, popchips are simply potatoes, popped to perfection. We take potatoes, add heat & pressure then pop! You get chips that give you more for your taste buds, with fewer calories & more chips per serving than other fried or baked chips. popchips are gluten free, kosher, contain no trans fat, no added preservatives, no fake flavors and no synthetic colors. Select flavors non-GMO and vegan.
feature_bullets: POPCHIPS CRUNCH WITH A BBQ SAUCE RUB: Our BBQ seasoning blend is salty, spicy, sweet & smoky for flavor your crave without the fat. Contains pack of 12, 5oz. bags of popchips BBQ potato chips.

STOCK UP! A single chip is never enough to satisfy your natural craving for a crunchy snack. So do the sensible thing: stock up with a multi-pack or variety pack of popchips so you're ready for a crowd.

YOU CRAVE IT, WE POP IT! Potato chips, sweet potato chips, corn chips? Never fried, not baked & always real, our popped potato chips have all the flavor & only half the fat of leading fried potato chip brands.
KEEPING LIFE FLAVORFUL one chip at a time! We take potatoes, add heat & pressure then pop! Crunchy and flavorful, popchips are simply potatoes, popped. Zero trans or saturated fats non-GMO certified.

WANT MORE THAN ONE? Popchips have fewer calories & more chips per serving than other fried, baked or roasted potato chip brands. We created a new potato chip, one that’s deeply flavored but never deep fried.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
